On 14.01.2009, at 18:54, Ian Dickinson wrote:

> while I'm quite strongly in favour of a RESTful approach, there's some
> (not unexpected) concerns about efficiency etc

No pointers to empirical studies, sorry. But out of curiosity, what  
are the efficiency concerns? Compared with what?

Stefan
--
